Alpha Dolphy::

Alpha Left the cr, she felt dizzy and weak. She walked some steps 
trying to leave the Cr's room. She horrified looked all destruction 
around "What the Matrix happened here!!!" shouted the femme (The cr's 
area where she was hadn't received damage).  


"NOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!" shouted the young maximal.

she looked the damaged body of Azure Blade and ran towards it "DON'T 
DIE, DON'T DIE!!!!" said sobbing Alphah, she didn't see Azure Blade's 
spark



--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:


> OOC: First off, does Rampage's controller got anything about the 
link 
> between AzureBlade and him (protoform X and Z)?
> 
> BIC: The spark rose from the ruins of the CR chambers in Maximal 
city. 
> It stopped about three feet from the ground. After a few moments, 
it 
> went flying in the blue.
> 
> Spark: Freeeeee!!!!!! Ah! This feels good! I don't even need my 
wings 
> to fly!
> 
> It came down from where it came. A destroyed robotic body layed on 
the 
> floor. It was AzureBlade's
> 
> Spark: WHA...? How can I see myself? Am I hurt so bad? Am I just a 
> spark? NO! IT CAN'T BE!!!!!!
> 
> The spark remained there, looking at its old body.
